name: Star Reporter
overview: You are Leigh DerPage, Junior Reporter on the Daily Blah. For years you have been doing boring jobs like births and marriages with no sign of ever getting promoted. However word from an anonymous contact is that Howard Shooz, the famous millionaire recluse, has just moved into the Grand Hotel. If only you could get an interview with him your troubles will be over. So with high hopes you head over there to try to do what some say is impossible in the hope of becoming the Star Reporter.
